meanings.definition: Having a pleasantly plump or rounded figure.
meanings.sent1: The baby was the chubbiest in the nursery.
meanings.sent2: She always chose the chubbiest puppies at the shelter.
meanings.sent3: The chubbiest squirrel in the park could never resist a nut.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were the chubbiest, like ripe peaches.
meanings.sent5: The chubbiest teddy bear in the store looked the most huggable.

meanings.sent1: Among her friends, she was known as the chubbiest.
meanings.sent2: The chubbiest in the family always got the most dessert.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, he dressed up as the chubbiest superhero.
meanings.sent4: In the land of sweets, the chubbiest was the king.
meanings.sent5: The chubbiest of all the clouds blocked out the sun the most.
